overview: Joe Jackson joined Cranel, Inc. to lead the sales reorganization of Versitec, which is the service division of Cranel, Inc. In January of 2008, this sales reorganization expanded to include the document imaging distribution division, Cranel Imaging. Prior to this assignment, Joe held senior sales and marketing positions at Sarcom, Emerson, IRD Mechanalysis and Liebert Corporation. All of these businesses are focused in the information technology industry. At Cranel Imaging, Joe is responsible for the entire distribution sales of ECM products and software through four North American warehouses. At Versitec, Joe is responsible for the sales of the managed services business with headquarters in Columbus, OH. Joe holds a B.S. degree in Mechanical Engineering from the University of Minnesota and an MBA from The Ohio State University.
